hadiths.text: Umm Habibah narrated that Allah's Messenger (S) sad:"Whoever prays twelve Rak'ah in a day and night, a house will be built from him in Paradise: Four Rak'ah before Zuhr, two Rak'ah after it, two Rak'ah after Maghrib, two Rak'ah after Isha, and two Rak'ah before Fajr in the morning Salat

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِيمَنْ صَلَّى فِي يَوْمٍ وَلَيْلَةٍ ثِنْتَىْ عَشْرَةَ رَكْعَةً مِنَ السُّنَّةِ وَمَا لَهُ فِيهِ مِنَ الْفَضْلِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About One Who Prays Twelve Rak'ah Of Sunnah In A and Night, And What Virtues He Will Have For That
